title: MBASIC Ham Radio Programs
description: Amateur radio utilities including QSO loggers, callsign lookups, and radio tools

programs.title: QSO Logger
programs.description: Log amateur radio contacts (QSOs) with callsign, frequency, and time.

programs.title: QSO Editor
programs.description: Edit and manage your QSO log entries.

programs.title: QSO Finder
programs.description: Search through QSO logs for specific contacts.

programs.title: QSO List
programs.description: Generate formatted lists of QSO contacts.

programs.title: RBS Utilities
programs.description: Utilities for the Remote Base System (amateur radio).

programs.title: RBS Purge
programs.description: Clean up old entries from Remote Base System logs.
